description: This Dart source file defines the TransactionProvider class, which manages fetching, creating, updating, and deleting financial transactions by communicating with a backend API. It also provides transaction categorization totals.

classes.name: TransactionProvider
classes.description: A provider class extending ChangeNotifier to manage transaction data, including CRUD operations and category totals.

methods.name: fetchTransactions
methods.description: Fetches list of transactions from backend and updates the internal transaction list.

methods.name: addTransaction
methods.description: Adds a new transaction to backend and refreshes the transaction list.

methods.name: updateTransaction
methods.description: Updates an existing transaction on the backend and refreshes the transaction list.

methods.name: deleteTransaction
methods.description: Deletes a transaction by ID from backend and refreshes the transaction list.

methods.name: categoryTotals
methods.description: Calculates and returns the total amount per category from current transactions.
